EmailTemplate.name: Fundraiser Contingent Offers
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
We appreciate you considering YETI for your event.
While we are not in a position to offer a full product donation at this time, we believe you may be a good candidate for our Fundraiser Program. This will allow your organization to purchase up to two (2) YETI Hoppers at a discount to be used in an auction, raffle, or as a tournament prize. YETI reserves the right to approve or decline applications at our discretion.
In order to qualify for the Fundraiser Program, please provide some additional information on your event/organization (flyer, social/web link, or other official document). Additionally, please explain how the coolers will be used.
Please let us know if you have questions.
Sincerely,
{!User.CommunityNickname} The YETI Outfitters 512.394.9384 customerservice@yeti.com yeti.com
